component.name: Plakativ
component.summary: Create large posters by printing and gluing together smaller pages

description.p: This program is for situations when you want to create a large poster or banner but do not have a printer that supports large sheets of paper. Plakativ allows one to enlarge and split a PDF across multiple pages, creating another PDF with pages of the desired printable size. After printing, the pages can be cut and glued together to form a larger poster.
